title: Splash Art Animations
body:
http://fav.me/d9urp0l
http://fav.me/d9urnru
I did some quick animations of some league of legends art. I'd be happy to take on requests for animations like this while I get used to using the program and stuff like that.
Must be safe for work and preferably something that looks like it could be animated. (Must have a background)

replies.body: I absolutely love it. Could you make one of the aurelian sol skin? And also could you see if you could make a banner style one in HD? hint hint youtube channel hint hint. I'll see if I can make you a blog for this artwork too! Its AMAZING!
